xml.log: If there is an update when the file file is missing, go to Steam Client - Library List - mydockfinder - right-click menu - Properties - Local File - Verify software file integrity If the desktop icon is not displayed after enabling pre-stage scheduling, you can right-click on the desktop-view-display desktop icon to enable display desktop icon Changelog 1.Fixed the issue that the previous version of the full-screen game could not be switched 2.Fixed the previous version of the minimize animation and the actual position of the window misalignment 3.Optimized dock to minimize animation rendering 4.dock minimizes window icon to add middle mouse button to directly close the window 5.Fix the dock window preview not disappearing issue again 6.Fixed the issue that mydock and myfinder disappeared after displaying the desktop or WIN+D for all previous versions (including older versions), but the moment the desktop was displayed, there would still be a flash that disappeared and then displayed 7.Preferences - Added interface border transparency adjustment in themes 8.Fixed the issue that MyFinder multi-screen volume icon did not refresh 9.Fixed an issue where the Launchpad advanced editing interface did not have a workshop icon preview and an edit icon display error issue 10.Launchpad adds only added icons and desktop icons feature, users who previously selected Start Menu and desktop icons will change to only desktop icons and will need to reselect the icons to display in Preferences - Launchpad
